description:
The four members of the Shuffle Alliance reach Neo Hong Kong for the finals, however Domon is not there. Still trapped in the Guyana Highlands, he spots a Neo Japan capsule containing the God Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bright New Star! The Birth of the Burning Gundam
Strahlender, neuer Stern! Die Geburt des God Gundams
Une lumière nouvelle ! L’arrivée du God Gundam
新たなる輝き! ゴッドガンダム誕生
